# Slider Nav Button

> Pill-shaped slider navigation button with divider-to-hover animation. When you hover over the left or right arrow, a background slides out from the central divider toward the hovered side.

## About

Slider Nav Button is a lightweight, accessible UI component for carousels and sliders. Works with Vanilla JavaScript and React.

## Key Features

- Pill-shaped design with smooth divider-to-hover animation
- Three sizes: sm, md, lg
- Customizable via CSS variables (dark theme, colors)
- Vanilla JS and React support
- Optional custom icons via iconLeft/iconRight props

## Installation

```bash
npm install slider-nav-button
```

For React: `npm install @hugeicons/react @hugeicons/core-free-icons` (peer deps)

## Usage

Vanilla JS:
```js
import { SliderButton } from 'slider-nav-button';
import 'slider-nav-button/styles.css';
const button = new SliderButton({ onPrev: () => {}, onNext: () => {} });
button.mount('#container');
```

React:
```jsx
import { SliderButton } from 'slider-nav-button/react';
<SliderButton onPrev={handlePrev} onNext={handleNext} size="md" />
```
